verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> Give ear עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> O my people תּוֹרָתִ֑י <WH8451> [to] my law הַטּ֥וּ <WH5186> incline אָ֝זְנְכֶ֗ם <WH241> your ears לְאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> to the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> of my mouth
אֶפְתְּחָ֣ה <WH6605> I will open בְמָשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> in a parable פִּ֑י <WH6310> my mouth אַבִּ֥יעָה <WH5042> I will utter חִ֝יד֗וֹת <WH2420> dark sayings מִנִּי־ <WH4480> at קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of old
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which שָׁ֭מַעְנוּ <WH8085> Which we have heard וַנֵּדָעֵ֑ם <WH3045> and known וַ֝אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> and our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> have told לָֽנוּ׃

לֹ֤א <WH3808> We will not נְכַחֵ֨ד ׀ <WH3582> We will not hide מִבְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> [them] from their children לְד֥וֹר <WH1755> to the generation אַחֲר֗וֹן <WH314> to come מְֽ֭סַפְּרִים <WH5608> shewing תְּהִלּ֣וֹת <WH8416> the praises יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וֶעֱזוּז֥וֹ <WH5807> and his strength וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and his wonderful works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> that he hath done

וַיָּ֤קֶם <WH6965> For he established עֵד֨וּת ׀ <WH5715> a testimony בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> in Jacob וְתוֹרָה֮ <WH8451> a law שָׂ֤ם <WH7760> and appointed בְּיִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> in Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which צִ֭וָּה <WH6680> which he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> our fathers לְ֝הוֹדִיעָ֗ם <WH3045> that they should make them known לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1121> to their children

לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> might יֵדְע֨וּ ׀ <WH3045> might know דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> That the generation אַ֭חֲרוֹן <WH314> to come בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> [them even] the children יִוָּלֵ֑דוּ <WH3205> [which] should be born יָ֝קֻ֗מוּ <WH6965> [who] should arise וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <WH5608> and declare לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1121> [them] to their children

וְיָשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> That they might set בֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> in God כִּ֫סְלָ֥ם <WH3689> their hope וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יִ֭שְׁכְּחוּ <WH7911> and not forget מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <WH4611> the works אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God וּמִצְוֹתָ֥יו <WH4687> his commandments יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5341> but keep

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִהְי֨וּ ׀ <WH1961> become כַּאֲבוֹתָ֗ם <WH1> And might not be as their fathers דּוֹר֮ <WH1755> generation סוֹרֵ֪ר <WH5637> a stubborn וּמֹ֫רֶ֥ה <WH4784> and rebellious דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> a generation לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> aright לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> not their heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> was not נֶאֶמְנָ֖ה <WH539> was not stedfast אֶת־ <WH854> for אֵ֣ל <WH410> with God רוּחֽוֹ׃ <WH7307> and whose spirit

בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> The children אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> of Ephraim נוֹשְׁקֵ֥י <WH5401> [being] armed רוֹמֵי־ <WH7411> [and] carrying קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> bows הָ֝פְכ֗וּ <WH2015> turned back בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day קְרָֽב׃ <WH7128> of battle

לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָׁ֭מְרוּ <WH8104> They kept בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> not the covenant אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וּ֝בְתוֹרָת֗וֹ <WH8451> in his law מֵאֲנ֥וּ <WH3985> and refused לָלֶֽכֶת׃ <WH1980> to walk
וַיִּשְׁכְּח֥וּ <WH7911> And forgat עֲלִילוֹתָ֑יו <WH5949> his works וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and his wonders אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he הֶרְאָֽם׃ <WH7200> that he had shewed

נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> he in the sight אֲ֭בוֹתָם <WH1> of their fathers עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> did פֶ֑לֶא <WH6382> Marvellous things בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> of Egypt שְׂדֵה־ <WH7704> [in] the field צֹֽעַן׃ <WH6814> of Zoan

בָּ֣קַע <WH1234> He divided יָ֭ם <WH3220> the sea וַיַּֽעֲבִירֵ֑ם <WH5674> and caused them to pass through וַֽיַּצֶּב־ <WH5324> to stand מַ֥יִם <WH4325> and he made the waters כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like נֵֽד׃ <WH5067> as an heap

וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <WH5148> also he led בֶּעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> them with a cloud יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> In the daytime וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַ֝לַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> and all the night בְּא֣וֹר <WH216> with a light אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

יְבַקַּ֣ע <WH1234> He clave צֻ֭רִים <WH6697> the rocks בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וַ֝יַּ֗שְׁקְ <WH8248> and gave [them] drink כִּתְהֹמ֥וֹת <WH8415> depths רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> as [out of] the great

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <WH3318> He brought נוֹזְלִ֣ים <WH5140> streams מִסָּ֑לַע <WH5553> also out of the rock וַיּ֖וֹרֶד <WH3381> to run down כַּנְּהָר֣וֹת <WH5104> like rivers מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> and caused waters

וַיּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <WH3254> yet more ע֭וֹד <WH5750> still לַחֲטֹא־ <WH2398> And they sinned ל֑וֹ לַֽמְר֥וֹת <WH4784> against him by provoking עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> the most High בַּצִּיָּֽה׃ <WH6723> in the wilderness
וַיְנַסּוּ־ <WH5254> And they tempted אֵ֥ל <WH410> God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <WH3824> in their heart לִֽשְׁאָל־ <WH7592> by asking אֹ֥כֶל <WH400> meat לְנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> for their lust

וַֽיְדַבְּר֗וּ <WH1696> Yea they spake בֵּֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> against God אָ֭מְרוּ <WH559> they said הֲי֣וּכַל <WH3201> Can אֵ֑ל <WH410> God לַעֲרֹ֥ךְ <WH6186> furnish שֻׁ֝לְחָ֗ן <WH7979> a table בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> desert

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold הִכָּה־ <WH5221> Behold he smote צ֨וּר ׀ <WH6697> the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <WH2100> gushed out מַיִם֮ <WH4325> that the waters וּנְחָלִ֪ים <WH5158> and the streams יִ֫שְׁטֹ֥פוּ <WH7857> overflowed הֲגַם־ <WH1571> again לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> bread י֣וּכַל <WH3201> can תֵּ֑ת <WH5414> he give אִם־ <WH518> lo יָכִ֖ין <WH3559> he provide שְׁאֵ֣ר <WH7607> flesh לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> folk

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> Therefore שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֥ר <WH5674> [this] and was wroth וְ֭אֵשׁ <WH784> so a fire נִשְּׂקָ֣ה <WH5400> was kindled בְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> against Jacob וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אַ֝֗ף <WH639> and anger עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> also came up בְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הֶ֭אֱמִינוּ <WH539> Because they believed בֵּאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> not in God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not בָ֝טְח֗וּ <WH982> and trusted בִּֽישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> not in his salvation
וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> Though he had commanded שְׁחָקִ֣ים <WH7834> the clouds מִמָּ֑עַל <WH4605> from above וְדַלְתֵ֖י <WH1817> the doors שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> of heaven פָּתָֽח׃ <WH6605> and opened

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <WH4305> And had rained down עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> and מָ֣ן <WH4478> manna לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> upon them to eat וּדְגַן־ <WH1715> them of the corn שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> of heaven נָ֣תַן <WH5414> and had given לָֽמוֹ׃
לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> food אַ֭בִּירִים <WH47> angels' אָ֣כַל <WH398> did eat אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> Man צֵידָ֬ה <WH6720> them meat שָׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> he sent לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> in לָשֹֽׂבַע׃ <WH7648> to the full

יַסַּ֣ע <WH5265> to blow קָ֭דִים <WH6921> He caused an east wind בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> in the heaven וַיְנַהֵ֖ג <WH5090> he brought in בְּעֻזּ֣וֹ <WH5797> and by his power תֵימָֽן׃ <WH8486> the south wind

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <WH4305> He rained עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> upon כֶּעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> also upon them as dust שְׁאֵ֑ר <WH7607> flesh וּֽכְח֥וֹל <WH2344> like as the sand יַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH3220> of the sea ע֣וֹף <WH5775> fowls כָּנָֽף׃ <WH3671> and feathered
וַ֭יַּפֵּל <WH5307> And he let [it] fall בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in the midst מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <WH4264> of their camp סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> round about לְמִשְׁכְּנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4908> their habitations
וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> So they did eat וַיִּשְׂבְּע֣וּ <WH7646> filled מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and were well וְ֝תַֽאֲוָתָ֗ם <WH8378> them their own desire יָבִ֥א <WH935> for he gave לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

לֹא־ <WH3808> not זָר֥וּ <WH2114> They were not estranged מִתַּאֲוָתָ֑ם <WH8378> from their lust ע֝֗וֹד <WH5750> While אָכְלָ֥ם <WH400> But while their meat בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> [was] yet in their mouths

וְאַ֤ף <WH639> The wrath אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> of God עָ֘לָ֤ה <WH5927> came בָהֶ֗ם וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <WH2026> upon them and slew בְּמִשְׁמַנֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH4924> the fattest וּבַחוּרֵ֖י <WH970> the chosen יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> [men] of Israel הִכְרִֽיעַ׃ <WH3766> of them and smote down

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all זֹ֭את <WH2063> likewise חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> For all this they sinned ע֑וֹד <WH5750> still וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <WH539> still and believed בְּנִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> not for his wondrous works
וַיְכַל־ <WH3615> did he consume בַּהֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> in vanity יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3117> Therefore their days וּ֝שְׁנוֹתָ֗ם <WH8141> and their years בַּבֶּהָלָֽה׃ <WH928> in trouble

אִם־ <WH518> When הֲרָגָ֥ם <WH2026> When he slew וּדְרָשׁ֑וּהוּ <WH1875> them then they sought וְ֝שָׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> him and they returned וְשִֽׁחֲרוּ־ <WH7836> and enquired early אֵֽל׃ <WH410> after God

וַֽ֭יִּזְכְּרוּ <WH2142> And they remembered כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> that God צוּרָ֑ם <WH6697> [was] their rock וְאֵ֥ל <WH410> God עֶ֝לְיוֹן <WH5945> and the high גֹּאֲלָֽם׃ <WH1350> their redeemer
וַיְפַתּ֥וּהוּ <WH6601> Nevertheless they did flatter בְּפִיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> him with their mouth וּ֝בִלְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> unto him with their tongues יְכַזְּבוּ־ <WH3576> and they lied לֽוֹ׃

וְ֭לִבָּם <WH3820> For their heart לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> was not right עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> toward וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor נֶ֝אֶמְנ֗וּ <WH539> with him neither were they stedfast בִּבְרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> in his covenant

וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he רַח֨וּם ׀ <WH7349> But he [being] full of compassion יְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> forgave עָוֹן֮ <WH5771> [their] iniquity וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not יַ֫שְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> and destroyed וְ֭הִרְבָּה <WH7235> [them] not yea many a time לְהָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> away אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> he his anger וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not יָ֝עִיר <WH5782> and did not stir up כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH2534> all his wrath

וַ֭יִּזְכֹּר <WH2142> For he remembered כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> that they [were but] flesh הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> a wind ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> that passeth away וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> and cometh not again
כַּ֭מָּה <WH4100> How יַמְר֣וּהוּ <WH4784> oft did they provoke בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> him in the wilderness יַ֝עֲצִיב֗וּהוּ <WH6087> [and] grieve בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <WH3452> him in the desert
וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> Yea they turned back וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <WH5254> and tempted אֵ֑ל <WH410> God וּקְד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel הִתְווּ׃ <WH8428> and limited

לֹא־ <WH3808> did not זָכְר֥וּ <WH2142> They remembered אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> not his hand י֝֗וֹם <WH3117> [nor] the day אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> when פָּדָ֥ם <WH6299> when he delivered מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from צָֽר׃ <WH6862> them from the enemy

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> When שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> How he had wrought בְּ֭מִצְרַיִם <WH4714> in Egypt אֹֽתוֹתָ֑יו <WH226> his signs וּ֝מוֹפְתָ֗יו <WH4159> and his wonders בִּשְׂדֵה־ <WH7704> in the field צֹֽעַן׃ <WH6814> of Zoan

וַיַּהֲפֹ֣ךְ <WH2015> And had turned לְ֭דָם <WH1818> into blood יְאֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH2975> their rivers וְ֝נֹזְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5140> and their floods בַּל־ <WH1077> not יִשְׁתָּיֽוּן׃ <WH8354> that they could not drink

יְשַׁלַּ֬ח <WH7971> He sent בָּהֶ֣ם עָ֭רֹב <WH6157> divers sorts of flies וַיֹּאכְלֵ֑ם <WH398> among them which devoured וּ֝צְפַרְדֵּ֗עַ <WH6854> them and frogs וַתַּשְׁחִיתֵֽם׃ <WH7843> which destroyed
וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> He gave לֶחָסִ֣יל <WH2625> unto the caterpiller יְבוּלָ֑ם <WH2981> also their increase וִֽ֝יגִיעָ֗ם <WH3018> and their labour לָאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH697> unto the locust
יַהֲרֹ֣ג <WH2026> He destroyed בַּבָּרָ֣ד <WH1259> with hail גַּפְנָ֑ם <WH1612> their vines וְ֝שִׁקְמוֹתָ֗ם <WH8256> and their sycomore trees בַּֽחֲנָמַֽל׃ <WH2602> with frost
וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר <WH5462> He gave up לַבָּרָ֣ד <WH1259> also to the hail בְּעִירָ֑ם <WH1165> their cattle וּ֝מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4735> and their flocks לָרְשָׁפִֽים׃ <WH7565> to hot thunderbolts

יְשַׁלַּח־ <WH7971> He cast בָּ֨ם ׀ חֲר֬וֹן <WH2740> upon them the fierceness אַפּ֗וֹ <WH639> of his anger עֶבְרָ֣ה <WH5678> wrath וָזַ֣עַם <WH2195> and indignation וְצָרָ֑ה <WH6869> and trouble מִ֝שְׁלַ֗חַת <WH4917> by sending מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <WH4397> angels רָעִֽים׃ <WH7451> evil
